ygData.subject: Re: Smithing
ygData.msgSnippet: I m afriad that the closest place is HighHold Pass. There you can find a number of smithing supplies. However the journey is lonnnngggg and dangerous to under
ygData.messageBody:
I'm afriad that the closest place is HighHold Pass. There you can find a number
of smithing supplies. However the journey is lonnnngggg and dangerous to under
9th level characters. Camo and Invis a great help. Take Qeynos Hills to west
karana to north karana to east karana and then to HighHold Pass and explore the
city. You could also go into the beholder maze if you and a 17+ character and
fight some mudites, they drop ore and clay.

MCollins wrote:

> From: MCollins <sandman1@...>
>
> I am a beginning smith based in Qeynos and i am having a great deal of
> trouble finding ore near that city. I was told that the closest place
> to find ore was in the Dwarven area, but I find it hard to believe that
> I would have to go that far! Does anyone know of a place I can get ore
> within 2or 3 zones of Qeynos?
>
> Marc
>
